data.OPTION-C: He calls his boss to ask for a delay in submitting the speech.

data.QUESTION: What does Li Hua choose to do after he hangs up the phone?
data.OPTION-A: He continues to paint in the park, even if the paint is not enough.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the bookstore to meet Xiao Wang.
data.OPTION-C: He goes home to prepare for the math exam.
data.OPTION-D: He goes to the art supply store to buy paint.

data.问题: 张伟帮助李华解决数学问题后，他接下来会做什么？

data.STORY: Zhang Wei is a diligent college student, he is studying in the library for the upcoming exam. Suddenly, he receives an urgent call from his good friend Li Hua, Li Hua needs help solving a difficult math problem. Zhang Wei is happy to help, but he also realizes that time is pressing, the exam is less than two days away. While he is helping Li Hua, his other friend Wang Fang sends a message, inviting him to a birthday party tonight. Zhang Wei knows this party is important to Wang Fang, but he also knows he needs to study.
data.QUESTION: After Zhang Wei helps Li Hua solve the math problem, what does he do next?
data.OPTION-A: He continues to study for the exam in the library.
data.OPTION-B: He goes home to rest because he feels very tired.
data.OPTION-C: He goes to Wang Fang's birthday party.
data.OPTION-D: He calls another friend to discuss whether to go to the party or not.

data.故事: 下午四点，李华刚从学校回家，正准备开始做他的数学家庭作业。突然，他的小狗跑过来，显得很兴奋，好像在院子里找到了什么。李华好奇地跟着去看，发现是一只受伤的小鸟。他决定先把小鸟带进屋内安置好。这时，他收到他的篮球队队长发来的信息，询问他是否会参加今晚的额外训练。李华知道训练对即将到来的比赛很重要，但他还没有完成他的数学作业，而且他的妈妈希望他能早点完成作业。
data.问题: 在处理完小鸟的情况后，李华接下来会做什么？
data.选项A: A. 去参加篮球队的额外训练。
data.选项B: B. 继续在院子里和小狗玩，寻找其他可能需要帮助的小动物。
data.选项C: C. 开始做数学作业。
data.选项D: D. 准备晚饭，帮助妈妈减轻负担。
data.STORY: At four in the afternoon, Li Hua just comes home from school and is about to start his math homework. Suddenly, his puppy runs over, looking very excited, as if it finds something in the yard. Li Hua curiously follows to see and discovers it is an injured little bird. He decides to first bring the bird into the house for care. At this time, he receives a message from his basketball team captain, asking if he is going to attend the extra training tonight. Li Hua knows that training is important for the upcoming game, but he does not finish his math homework yet, and his mother hopes that he finishes the homework early.
data.QUESTION: After dealing with the bird situation, what does Li Hua do next?
data.OPTION-A: He goes to attend the extra training of the basketball team.
data.OPTION-B: He continues to play with the puppy in the yard, looking for other animals that might need help.
data.OPTION-C: He starts doing math homework.
data.OPTION-D: He prepares dinner to help lighten his mother's burden.

data.问题: 李华看完信息后，他会怎么做？
data.选项A: A. 离开图书馆去帮助王刚解决数学问题。
data.选项B: B. 向老师求助，一起解决王刚的数学问题。
data.选项C: C. 请求老师允许他在图书馆多待一会儿，以便帮助王刚。
data.选项D: D. 忽略王刚的信息，专注于阅读。
data.STORY: Li Hua is in the library, focusing on reading a book about history, preparing for tomorrow's exam. His good friend Wang Gang sends an urgent message, needing his help to solve a math problem. Li Hua checks the message, but he knows if he leaves now, there may not be enough time to complete his review. At the same time, his teacher happens to come over, reminding him that the library is about to close, and asking him if he needs extra materials to help study.
data.QUESTION: After Li Hua reads the message, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: He leaves the library to help Wang Gang solve the math problem.
data.OPTION-B: He asks the teacher for help to solve Wang Gang's math problem together.
data.OPTION-C: He asks the teacher to allow him to stay in the library a little longer to help Wang Gang.
data.OPTION-D: He ignores Wang Gang's message and focuses on reading.
